product_name: Fat Tire Wisconsin: A Mountain Bike Trail Guide - 2nd Edition
long_description: In this updated edition, you'll find 21 challenging new trail systems, as well as changes and expansions to older systems. Authors: W. Chad McGrath and Mark Parman. Softcover; 135 pages; maps. University of Wisconsin Press; copyright 2001. Features details of terrain and levels of difficulty, trail maps, directions to the trail sites, and use fees. Includes information on organizations, races and websites.
short_description: In this updated edition, you'll find 21 challenging new trail systems, as well as changes and expansions to older systems.
